channel.title: Help... how do i ip ban people?
channel.description:
i already know whre their ip comes from but i dont know how to ip ban
thanks!

Yea, well some servers have a seperate folder for bans…Or in Data…For instance I use hellzend which has a seperate folder.

item.title: Help... how do i ip ban people?
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Go to (your server folder) > Bans > Ipbans > copy and paste IP.

Read full topic
item.source: Help... how do i ip ban people?

item.title: Help... how do i ip ban people?
item.dc:creator: @croranger croranger
item.description:
@croranger wrote:

u can use command ::ipban here it is:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 2 ||

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“player successfully ip banned”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic
